import { I{{EntityName}} } from './{{EntityName}}.interfaces';

export class {{EntityName}} {
  constructor(
    private readonly _id: string,
    private readonly _name: string,
    private readonly _description?: string,
    private readonly _active: boolean = true,
    private readonly _createdAt: Date = new Date(),
  ) {}

  static create({
    id,
    name,
    description,
    active = true,
    createdAt = new Date(),
  }: I{{EntityName}}) {
    return new {{EntityName}}(
      id,
      name,
      description,
      active,
      createdAt,
    );
  }

  toJSON() {
    return this.values;
  }

  get values() {
    return {
      id: this._id,
      name: this._name,
      description: this._description,
      active: this._active,
      createdAt: this._createdAt,
    };
  }

  get id() {
    return this._id;
  }

  get name() {
    return this._name;
  }

  get description() {
    return this._description;
  }

  get active() {
    return this._active;
  }

  get createdAt() {
    return this._createdAt;
  }
}
